Introduction

Taeha is a South Korean singer and pilates instructor under NRW. She is a former member of the girl group Berry Good and its sub-unit Berry Good HEART HEART. She left the group in 2019.
In October 2022, Taeha released her first solo single "(If we loved a little more)". She came back with her album "(City light)" with a concept inspired by City-pop with retrowave.
